name: gym-platform-testing
description: Scripts de testing para la plataforma del gimnasio

scripts.test-health: node -e "require('axios').get('https://gym-platform-backend.onrender.com/health').then(r => console.log('✅ Health OK:', r.data)).catch(e => console.log('❌ Health FAILED:', e.message))"
scripts.test-register: node -e "require('axios').post('https://gym-platform-backend.onrender.com/auth/register', {email: 'test@test.com', password: 'test123', name: 'Test User', role: 'cliente'}).then(r => console.log('✅ Register OK:', r.data)).catch(e => console.log('❌ Register FAILED:', e.response?.data || e.message))"
scripts.test-login: node -e "require('axios').post('https://gym-platform-backend.onrender.com/auth/login', {email: 'test@test.com', password: 'test123'}).then(r => console.log('✅ Login OK:', r.data)).catch(e => console.log('❌ Login FAILED:', e.response?.data || e.message))"

author: Tu Nombre
